testcase.name: Verify Suggested address
testcase.failure:
Scenario: Verify Suggested address
Given Login as horizon_engra3@pb.com And I navigate to Address Book page And on Address Book page I import addresses with overwrite from contacts_for_address_verification.csv And I navigate to Create Label page and select Priority Mail Boxes packages And on Create label page I click on select recipient address When on Create label page I select recipient address to verify as Suggested from contacts_for_address_verification.csv And on the create label page I click on Recipient's Accept and Verify button Then on verify address page I see correct address as Suggested And on the create label page I click on Use Suggested button And on Create Label page I verify entered recipient address for Suggested and used as suggested And on the create label page I see that address was verified And on create label page I select Priority Mail Flat Rate Boxes as package type And on create label page I select Priority Mail Small Box as package type And on the create label page I select Priority Mail as shipping service Then I verify that Print label button is active
Message:
Unable to locate element: {"method":"id","selector":"username"} (Selenium::WebDriver::Error::NoSuchElementError) [remote server] file:///var/folders/f6/pbn__5hs3957gbdzr0tb2jqc00007q/T/webdriver-profile20151020-44651-148gwo2/extensions/fxdriver@googlecode.com/components/driver-component.js:10667:in `FirefoxDriver.prototype.findElementInternal_' [remote server] file:///var/folders/f6/pbn__5hs3957gbdzr0tb2jqc00007q/T/webdriver-profile20151020-44651-148gwo2/extensions/fxdriver@googlecode.com/components/driver-component.js:623:in `fxdriver.Timer.prototype.setTimeout/<.notify' ./features/pages/sign_in_page.rb:34:in `enter_email_address' ./features/step_definitions/sign_in_page_steps.rb:26:in `/^I enter my user ID as "(.*?)"$/' ./features/step_definitions/sign_in_page_steps.rb:11:in `/^Login as (.*)$/' features/test/shippingUIAutomation/create_label/createlabel_recipient_address_verification.feature:6:in `Given Login as horizon_engra3@pb.com'

testcase.name: Select Original or Suggested address: use suggested
Select Original or Suggested address: use original
